title: Remove Before/After section site-wide and switch to premium white + gold light theme

requirements.text: Remove the entire “Before & After / Transformation” section everywhere it appears on the site, including the Home page and the Gallery page, so that no before/after transformation UI, headings, copy, or images are rendered.

quotes: poora section hi delete ker do

acceptanceCriteria: Home page no longer renders the BeforeAfterPreview section and there is no empty spacing where it used to be.
Gallery page no longer renders the Transformation Stories/BeforeAfterPair section and there is no empty spacing where it used to be.
No before/after transformation images (e.g., hype-before-1 / hype-after-1) are referenced by any rendered component in the UI.
Build succeeds with no unused-import TypeScript errors after removing the section(s).

requirements.text: Change the site-wide theme to a premium light look (white base with gold accents) and remove any forced dark-mode behavior so the entire site renders in light theme by default.

quotes: theme color change kar do light rakho
white + gold premiume look ke sath

acceptanceCriteria: The app is no longer forced into dark mode (e.g., ThemeProvider is not set to forcedTheme="dark" / defaultTheme="dark").
Global background is light (white or near-white) with dark readable foreground text across all pages.
Gold is the primary accent used consistently for highlights, gradients, borders, icons, and CTA emphasis across the site.
No prominent red/neon-blue accent styling remains in key UI elements (header brand/icon, primary CTA buttons, page title gradients, etc.).

requirements.text: Update existing UI components that hard-code the previous accent colors (currently using specific OKLCH color literals) to use the new white+gold design tokens/variables so the premium gold accent is consistent across Header, Hero, Contact headings, Footer, and other highlighted elements.

quotes: theme color change kar do light rakho
white + gold premiume look ke sath

acceptanceCriteria: Header brand icon/gradient, navigation hover/active styles, and “Join Now” button use the gold accent rather than the old hard-coded OKLCH values.
Hero section accent pill, headline gradient, and CTAs use gold accents consistent with the new theme.
Page title gradient accents (e.g., Gallery/Contact headings) use the new gold accent styling.
Footer accent elements (icons, brand name, heart) use the new gold accent styling.
Accent colors are controlled primarily via theme variables/tokens rather than repeated hard-coded color literals throughout components.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui/*.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not remove or modify the Membership or Free Trial lead-capture forms or backend submission logic.
Do not delete image files from frontend/public/assets/generated as part of this change; only remove the Before/After section from the UI.
Do not change the site’s routes or page structure beyond removing the Before/After section content.

preferencesToAdd: Site-wide premium light theme: white base with gold accents.
Remove the Before & After transformation section site-wide.
